text:
Girlicious are a girl group that is being host by Chelsea Korka, Melissa Reyes, and Melissa Smith. After all three have failed to become members
of the Pussycat Dolls, they have decided to create their own group with the approval of Robin Antin.
Unlike the search for the next member of Pussycat Dolls, there was more finalist chosen than just one. The time of when this was featured on television is still unknown as it was still being filmed.
